bottom_banner.text: This portal is part of a pilot initiative to support applied research partnerships. If you have ideas for how to further improve it, please [let us know!](/contact)

main_contact_text.ongoingText: We plan to post results and deliverables when the project is complete. In the meantime, we welcome questions about the project.
main_contact_text.completeText: Weâ€™re eager to learn how you use the results and welcome any questions.
